description.narrative: Premises and Security, which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 6. COVID-19 Response

sector.narrative: Management and Operations support at CO

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF Bangladesh management functioned well, with a clear structure of governance and oversight despite changes in senior management at the beginning of the year and at midyear. Effective management oversight was maintained, with regular monitoring of progress against priorities and effective use of monitoring systems throughout the year to ensure effective risk management, value for money and quality assurance in programme delivery. UNICEF Bangladesh closed all 19 internal audit recommendations and sustained the recommended actions. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

actual.value: 2019:ICT worked closely with Innovation in providing technical advice and support to development of Technology related elements for Terms of References (TORs) of all Sections.
2019:Implementation of the updated SOPs and roll-out of transactions to Field offices begun in quarter four of 2019, evaluation of the processes will be conducted in quarter one of 2020

actual.value: 2019:SOPS updated to implement GSSC recommendations, approved by CMT and feedback received from GSSC. Orientation and rollout of transaction processing to Field offices completed.

target.value: 2019:Two Feedback incorporated into revision of SoPs

actual.value: 2019:Implementation of the updated SOPs and rollout of transactions to Field offices begun in quarter four of 2019, evaluation of the processes will be conducted in quarter one of 2020

actual.value: 2019:Fully achieved, country office will continue to fine tune work processes as GSSC rolls out new tools and audit recommendations are sustained.
